name: bitr

scripts.deploy:local: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/BitrPool.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:monad: cd solidity && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-production.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:bitr-token: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/BitrToken.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:guided-oracle: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/GuidedOracle.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:bitr-pool: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/BitrPool.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:optimistic-oracle: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/OptimisticOracle.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:bitr-faucet: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/BitrFaucet.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:bitr-staking: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/BitrStaking.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:oddyssey: cd solidity && npx hardhat ignition deploy ./ignition/modules/Oddyssey.js --network monad
scripts.deploy:production: cd solidity && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-production.js --network monad
